summary: Tairaku is a teacher at a local high school. He has a crush on Ms. Satsuki, a fellow teacher whom he hopes to someday marry. Then he meets Aya Shirakaba, upon whom he makes such a favorable... See full summary »
cast: Kotono Mitsuishi|Yûji Ueda|Yûko Miyamura|Shigeru Chiba|Akio Suyama|Kenny Alfonso|Ruben Arvizu|Susan Bennet|Sara Burmenko|Chafûrin|Brian Clark|Tom Clark|Randy Cohlmia|Dan Coleman|Marsha Crenshaw|Brad Davidorf|Hisao Egawa|Bob Harter|Scott Hilley|Sôichirô Hoshi|Shôji Izumi|Katsuyuki Konishi|Carey Means|Takashi Nagasako|Chinami Nishimura|Harvey Reaves|Rick Reitz|Tomo Saeki|Chiyako Shibahara|Dianne Smith|Jun Suzuki|Kyôsei Tsukui|Megumi Urawa
title: Kyokasho ni Nai!
